transport.question: I go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I have wheels.
🚦 I drive on the road.
🔑 You need a grown-up to drive me.

transport.question: I carry lots of people on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🛑 I stop to let people on and off.
👧 You might ride me to school when you are older

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🛩️ I have wings.
☁️ I fly very high.
🌍 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I go on the water and carry people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
⚓ I need an anchor.
🐟 I am bigger than a toy boat.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You sit on a seat.
🚧 You need to balance to ride me.
🪖 You should wear a helmet when you ride me.

transport.question: I go choo-choo and run on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I have many carriages.
⬛ I stop at stations.
👧 I can take you to visit your grandma.

transport.question: I help you go up and down in a building. What am I?

hints.text: 🚪 I have doors that open and close.
⬆️ I can take you to a higher floor.
🏢 You find me in tall buildings.

transport.question: I am big and loud, and help put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am red.
🚨 I have a siren.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.

transport.question: I take you to space! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
✨ I go to the moon and stars.

transport.question: I carry things but you push me. What am I?

hints.text: 🛒 You use me at the shop.
🍎 You put food in me.
👪 A grown-up pushes me while you walk.

food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I'm the color of the sun!
🍌 You peel my skin before you eat me.
🐒 Monkeys go crazy for me!

food.question: I am white and cold. You eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm very, very cold.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
🍦 I'm a popular dessert.

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am the color of a firetruck!
🌳 You can find me growing on a tree!
🍎 Snow White loved me.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a yummy vegetable.
🐰 Bunnies can't get enough of me!
🧡 I am the color of a pumpkin.

food.question: I am a drink that is white. Cows give me to you. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You can drink me in a glass.
🐮 I come from a farm animal.
🍪 I am really good with cookies!

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of grass!
🌱 I grow in a garden.
👪 I am often served as a side dish.

food.question: I am made of flour and you bake me. You can put yummy toppings on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I can be cut into slices.
👨‍🍳 You can order me at a restaurant.
🍅 I am a very popular dish.

food.question: I am yellow and come from a chicken. You can scramble me or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I can be cooked many different ways.
🐔 Chickens lay me.
🍳 I am often eaten for breakfast.

food.question: I am a vegetable that's long and purple. Some people think of me as a fruit. What am I?

hints.text: 🍆 I am a purple vegetable that sometimes tastes like a fruit.
✨I can be grilled or baked
🌍 I am found in many different cultures and cuisines.

food.question: I am made from apples and I am sweet. You can spread me on toast. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I am often eaten with peanut butter!
🍎 I taste like the fruit I'm made from.
🍞 I can be spread onto bread.
